Cédric Giorgi
SPEAKERS
TICKETS

Cédric is co-Founder and CEO of Cookening, a new collaborative consumption platform in the food industry. He was until November 2011 in charge of Marketing, Communication and Business Development for Seesmic in Europe. Before that and during 4 years he was Marketing Director at Goojet, the French company behind Scoop.it, a new publishing platform using web curation.
